net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: abort(input( "Target|" + targetList("pc") +"|Target|RADIO|VALUE=STRING" ))] {Target} gains [gt, st, t("temporary hit points"): grantTempHp(4, Target)] due to virtue of valor.

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: Power = json.set("", "Name", "Fade Away", "Type", "Encounter", "ActionType", "Immediate Reaction", "Targets", 0, "TargetType", "pc", "Range", "", "Distance", 0, "Hit", "{}", "Miss", "{}", "Effect", json.set("", "Extra", "%{Player} becomes invisible until %{Player} attacks or until the end of %{Player}'s next turn."))]
{usePower(Power)}
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Fade Away

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: CharismaMod = getAbilityMod("Charisma")] [h: Power = json.set("", "Name", "Majestic Word", "Type", "Encounter", "ActionType", "Minor", "Targets", 1, "TargetType", "pc", "Range", "Close Burst", "Distance", 5, "Hit", "{}", "Miss", "{}", "Effect", json.set("", "Extra", "%{Target} may spend a healing surge and regain an additional " + CharismaMod + " hit points. %{Player} may slide %{Target} 1 square"))]
{usePower(Power)}
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Majestic Word

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: Power = json.set("", "Name", "Shout of Triumph", "Type", "Encounter", "ActionType", "Standard", "Targets", 2, "Bonus", 0, "TargetType", "npc", "Range", "Close Blast", "Distance", 3, "Ability", "Charisma", "Opposed", "Fortitude", "DamageType", "Thunder", "Hit", json.set("", "Dice", 1, "Sides", 6, "Ability", "Charisma", "Extra", "%{Player} may push %{Target} 3 squares"), "Miss", "{}", "Effect", json.set("", "Extra", "%{Player} may slide each ally in the blast 3 squares"))]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: abort(input( "Apply Damage To|" + token.name + "||LABEL|", "Damage" ))]
<!-- Remove Normal HPs --> Taking [gt, st, t("damage"): damage(Damage)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Apply Damage

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: abort(input( "Apply Healing To|" + token.name + "||LABEL|", "Health" ))]
[gt, st, t("Healing"): heal(Health)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Apply Healing

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: ExtraHP = getPropertyWithDefault("Mod Surge Value", 0)] [h: SurgeValue = getProperty("Surge Value")] [h: Surges = getProperty("Healing Surges Remaining")] [h: assert(Surges > 0 || state.Dying, "No Surges Remaining")]
[h: abort(input( "Healing Surge for |" + token.name + "||LABEL|", "Surge Value (HP)|" + SurgeValue + "||LABEL|", "ExtraHP | " + ExtraHP + "|Additional HP|TEXT|", "Available Surges |" + Surges + "||LABEL|" ))]
[h: HealCalculation = if(!Surges && state.Dying, "1 + 0", SurgeValue + " + " + ExtraHP)] [h: HealValue = eval(HealCalculation)] [h: HealCalculation = HealCalculation + " = " + HealValue]
[h: heal(HealValue)] Using a [gt, st, t("healing surge"): HealCalculation]
[h: setProperty("Healing Surges Remaining", max(Surges - 1, 0))] [h: setPropertyWithDefault("Mod Surge Value", 0, 0)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Healing Surge
Basic Melee Attack Old

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Initiative = getProperty("Initiative")] [h: addToInitiative()] Rolling [gt, st, t("initiative"): setInitiative(1d20+ Initiative)]. [h: sortInitiative()]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Roll Initiative

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Modifier = getPropertyWithDefault("Mod Saving Throws", 0)] [h: abort(input("Modifier|" + Modifier))] [gt, st, t(if(roll.result < 10, "Failed to save", "Successfully saved")): 1d20 + Modifier]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Saving Throw
End Turn

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: IntMod = getAbilityMod("Intelligence")] [h: Power = json.set("", "Name", "Flaming Sphere", "Type", "Daily", "ActionType", "Standard", "Targets", 1, "TargetType", "all", "Range", "Ranged", "Distance", 10, "Ability", "Intelligence", "Opposed", "Reflexes", "DamageType", "Fire", "Hit", json.set("", "Dice", 2, "Sides", 6, "Ability", "Intelligence", "Extra", ""), "Miss", "{}", "Effect", json.set("", "Extra", "%{Player} conjures a medium flaming sphere adjacent to the target. Any creature starting its turn adjacent to the sphere takes 1d4 + " + IntMod + " fire damage. As a move action, %{Player} may move the sphere 6 squares.", "SustainMinor", "You can sustain this power until the end of the encounter. As a standard action, you can make another attack with the sphere."))]
{usePower(Power)}

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [macro("Second Wind - Real@Lib:Skills"): ""]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Second Wind

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: ExtraHP = getPropertyWithDefault("Mod Surge Value", 0)] [h: SurgeValue = getProperty("Surge Value")] [h: Surges = getProperty("Healing Surges Remaining")] [h: assert(Surges > 0 || state.Dying, "No Surges Remaining")] [h: HealCalculation = if(!Surges && state.Dying, "1 + 0", SurgeValue + " + " + ExtraHP)] [h: HealValue = eval(HealCalculation)] [h: HealCalculation = HealCalculation + " = " + HealValue] [h: heal(HealValue)] Using Second Wind
[r: getName()] [gt, st, t("heals"): HealCalculation].
[r: getName()] gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of [r: listGet(pronouns(), 1)] next turn. [h: setProperty("Healing Surges Remaining", max(Surges - 1, 0))] [h: setPropertyWithDefault("Mod Surge Value", 0, 0)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Second Wind - Real

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: Power = json.set("", "Name", "Song of Courage", "Type", "Daily", "ActionType", "Minor", "Targets", 0, "TargetType", "pc", "Range", "Close Burst", "Distance", 5, "Hit", "{}", "Miss", "{}", "Effect", json.set("", "Extra", "%{Player} creates a zone of inspiration that lasts until the end of %{Player}'s next turn. While within the zone, any ally gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls. The zone moves with %{Player}. Sustain Minor: The zone persists."))]
{usePower(Power)}
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Song of Courage

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h: Power = json.set("", "Name", "Words of Friendship", "Type", "Encounter", "ActionType", "Minor", "Targets", 0, "TargetType", "pc", "Range", "Ranged", "Distance", 2, "Hit", "{}", "Miss", "{}", "Effect", json.set("", "Extra", "%{Player} gains a +5 power bonus to next diplomacy check %{Player} makes before the end of %{Player}'s next turn."))]
{usePower(Power)}
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Words of Friendship
